com.google.checkout.orderprocessing
Class RefundOrderRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.google.checkout.AbstractCheckoutRequest
      com.google.checkout.orderprocessing.RefundOrderRequest

public class RefundOrderRequest
extends AbstractCheckoutRequest

This class contains methods that construct <refund-order> API requests.
